"Excuse me, have you got a moment?":
"Aren't you the one who defeated
Dark Falz with our instructor, Ms. Aina?"
"That'd be me."
"And you two are...?"
"I knew it!"
"Ahh, so sorry about that!"
"My name's Ricoeur."

"I'm one of the people Aina's been training.
This here's Luka."
"H-Hi, I'm Luka."
"I'm glad to be able to meet you."
"I'm one of y'all's biggest fans!"

"I wanted to become a strong ARKS like you and Ms. Aina,
so I decided to enlist for the Combat Division!"

"Hey, Ricoeur! Aren't you being
a little too familiar?"

"W-What's the harm?! I'm just excited
to be able to actually meet them..."

"Forgive him. Although,
we really do look up to you all."

"We're really thankful to
be able to be instructed by Ms. Aina."
"Has Aina been a good teacher?"
"What's your impression of Aina?"
"Oh, but of course!"
"...But I'm a little..."
"She's an incredibly kind person."
"...But it's just that, well..."
"H-Hey, what do you think you're saying?!"
"Well, you know..."
"Just say what's on your mind."
"Is there a problem with Aina?"
"Uhh, well, you see..."
"I wouldn't call it a \"problem\" per se..."

"Ms. Aina's a super friendly
and good person and all, but..."

"It's just that her teaching style is unusual...
Er, well, \"unique\" I should say..."

"And sometimes I don't really
know what she's talking about..."

"Y-Yeah, earlier on I was pretty confused at first too...
But hey, she's gotten a lot easier to understand lately, right?"
"But like, in that Trainia test earlier..."

"Didn't we get higher scores doing it my way
than when we followed Aina's instructions?"
"That was a one-off..."
"But what about all the other times?"

"Some of us think it might be best if she just
taught us the basics and then let us train on our own."
"I wasn't really taught by anyone either."
"Give Aina a bit more time and take her lessons to heart."
"Yeah, that's what I thought, too."
"You're probably right..."

"Ms. Aina keeps telling us to
\"think about what it is we want to do\", but..."

"If we can just do whatever we want,
is there really a point...? Y'know..."
"But then again..."
"Let's just drop it already!"

"I'm so sorry we called on you out of the blue like this,
only to end up saying weird stuff..."

"Really, incredibly sorry.
Come on, let's go!"
"Whaaat? Come on, just a bit longer..."
